descriptionHtml:
Add 3 color variations costume hats for female no male sadly, it should work with most of KS hairdo without clipping issue, haven't test it with SG hair yet. you can craft it under hide armor section or use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64905/?]AdditemMenu[/url] mod.

Image from [b]H_homura[/b] the original creator (Right click on the image then Open image in new tab)

[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/101/images/40446-1-1316756943.jpg[/img]

Permission notes:

This mod was originally made by humidukihomura AKA H.homura for Oblivion [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/40446/?]Here[/url]. I only converted this mod to Skyrim. all meshes and textures belong to the original creator. You must credit the original creator of this mod if you want to use his/her assets in your mod, no need to credit me.

Permission notes from the original creator mod page:
------------------------------------------------------------
4.Modification and re-distribution
You freely modify, and can re-distribute this MOD. 
Please attach the readme file without fail when distributing it, and write my name (H.homura). 
------------------------------------------------------------ 

------------------------------------------------------------ 
Credits:
Homuras Cute Halloween Costume by [b]H_homura
[/b]Nightasy
------------------------------------------------------------ 

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24385/?]HAPPY HALLOWEEN !!![/url] !!!
author: 0Theara
